item.title: Yuni Kartika
item.description: I’m Yuni Kartika. I was born and live in Solo, a city in Central Java. I hold a bachelor degree in English language and literature. I’m running this website. Apart from my online lessons in Bahasa Indonesia, I train personell of local businesses to speak better English. I also speak basic German and Russian, both of which I’m currently learning.
